title: Ranaghat College
text:
Ranaghat College, established in 1950, is a <a href="Government%20of%20West%20Bengal">Government of West Bengal</a> sponsored, <a href="University%20Grants%20Commission%20%28India%29">UGC</a> recognized, <a href="National%20Assessment%20and%20Accreditation%20Council">NAAC</a> accreditated, <a href="Public%20college">Public</a> <a href="College">College</a> in <a href="Ranaghat">Ranaghat</a>, <a href="West%20Bengal">West Bengal</a>, <a href="India">India</a>. It offers <a href="Undergraduate">Undergraduate</a> courses in <a href="Humanities">Humanities</a>, <a href="commerce">commerce</a> and <a href="sciences">sciences</a>. Also offers <a href="Postgraduate">Postgraduate</a> course in <a href="Bengali%20language">Bengali</a>. It is affiliated to <a href="University%20of%20Kalyani">University of Kalyani</a>.
Accreditation.
Ranaghat College was awarded B+ grade by the <a href="National%20Assessment%20and%20Accreditation%20Council">National Assessment and Accreditation Council</a> (NAAC). The college is recognized by the <a href="University%20Grants%20Commission%20%28India%29">University Grants Commission</a> (UGC).
